## Giuseppe Espa
::: {layout="[70,30]"}
:::{#first-column}
Giuseppe Espa is Full Professor of Economic Statistics at the [Department of Economics and Management](https://www.economia.unitn.it){target="_blank"} of the University of Trento. He coordinates the research group StaTA.

See the [StaTA group at University of Trento](http://statagroup.economia.unitn.it/){target="_blank"} and the [CSSC](https://cssc.unitn.it/){target="_blank"} research group.

:::
